price: Sε moretua wͻn so ka (wͻ aniεyaa a wͻde ahyε mo no) a, εneε montwe wͻn aso pεpεεpε sεdeε wͻhyεε mo aniεyaa no ara. Na mmom sε monya aboterε nso a, anka εno na εyε dema aboterεfoͻ no.
arabic: وَإِنۡ عَاقَبۡتُمۡ فَعَاقِبُواْ بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِبۡتُم بِهِۦۖ وَلَئِن صَبَرۡتُمۡ لَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in ʿāqabtum faʿāqibū bimith'li mā ʿūqib'tum bihi wala-in ṣabartum lahuwa khayrun lilṣṣābirīna
